references.paper_title: NeRF: Representing Scenes as Neural Radiance Fields for View Synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces NeRF, a foundational technique for novel view synthesis that CAT3D builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: Instant neural graphics primitives with a multiresolution hash encoding
references.reason: This work introduces Instant-NGP, a method for efficient NeRF training that CAT3D uses in its 3D reconstruction pipeline.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian Splatting for Real-Time Radiance Field Rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces Gaussian splatting, another efficient technique for rendering NeRFs which is used for comparison in the CAT3D experiments.
This work introduces a method to generate 3D models from text prompts, a capability that CAT3D also aims to improve.
This paper presents a related approach using diffusion models for 3D reconstruction that CAT3D directly compares against and improves upon.
